Name: Mystic Confluence
Story Background: Born from the depths of the ocean, the Mystic Confluence harnesses the power of the tides and the wisdom of ancient sea creatures.
Ability: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. Counter target spell unless its controller pays 3. Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
Appearance Description: In a swirling vortex of shimmering blue energy, sea creatures and symbols of the tide converge, creating an otherworldly spectacle.
